content: to knit * break yarn pull end through last stitch sleeves using dp s distribute the 32 36 40 sleeve sts and pick up 2 sts from the body of the sweater - place marker at the center of the underarm 34 38 42 row 1 knit decreasing 2 sts at underarm k2 decrease before the marker and ssk after the marker 34 38 42 2-4 k around repeat row 1-4 until 24 26 28 k 3 row or until desired length cuffs k1 p1 * four row then bind off using same instructions for the body finishing use yarn needle to weave in ends sew on buttons and block as needed abbreviations k - knit p purl dp double point needles sts stitches pm place marker kfb increase by knitting into the front of the stitch then into the back of the same stitch k2tog decrease by knitting two stitches together ssk decrease by slipping the next two stitches one at a time as if to knit - onto the right hand needle insert left needle into the fronts of these two stitches and knit them together measurements in inches chest circumference 17 5 19 75 21 75 neck to hem 8 5 9 5 11 25 neck to cuff 8 25 9 5 10 5
